title: A whopping 91% of plastic isn't recycled - National Geographic
body: The Haunting Art of Plastic Pollution. Using trash from the sea and birds' stomachs, Mandy Barker's work forces us to face our waste. These Ice Pops Are Filled With Plastic and Other Waste.
readable_content:
- What is the big deal about Earth getting 2°C hotter?
- These thorny creatures destroy coral
